name: IMConsult
goal: IMConsult is active in EU public affairs, with a focus on association management and public affairs services for network industries. Additional services include coaching, general management and human resources matters for public affairs professionals and Brussels public affairs offices
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Climate Action, Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Electronic Communications Code
Empowering competition authorities (ECN+) directive
Energy Strategy and Energy Union
Digital Single Market
Europe on the move
